meta.name: description
meta.content: Dracut Public Schools will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 School Year. Remote Learning will continue. For Updates from the Superintendent of Schools See Below: Superintendent's Update April 9, 2020

link.title: COVID-19 CORONAVIRUS INFORMATION PAGE | Dracut Public Schools

meta.script: function waitForTranslateToDisplay(selector, time) { if(document.querySelector(selector)!=null) { var translate = document.getElementsByClassName("goog-te-combo")[0]; translate.setAttribute("aria-label", "Select language for translation");} else {setTimeout(function() { waitForTranslateToDisplay(selector, time);}, time);}}

span.span: Dracut Public Schools will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 School Year. Remote Learning will continue.
